Uses of Interface
modele.Questionable

Packages that use Questionable
Package
Description
modele
 
modele.occupant_no_moveable
 

  • Uses of Questionable in modele

    Classes in modele that implement Questionable
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    Border
    A Border is an Occupant that can be found all around the grid.
    class 
    Character
    A character is an occupant that can move.
    class 
    Cheater
    A character that cheat the hunters by giving them the worst direction to the treasure witch is the opposite of the best direction minus 1 mod 8 to make sure that the hunter does not go back to the treasure after hitting a border
    class 
    Hunter
    Hunter class is a character that can move on the grid and try to find the treasure.
    class 
    Occupant
    An occupant is an object that can be placed on the grid
    class 
    WiseMan
    The WiseMan class is a character that guides the hunter to the treasure by giving him the best direction to the treasure.

  • Uses of Questionable in modele.occupant_no_moveable

    Classes in modele.occupant_no_moveable that implement Questionable
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    Glue
    Class Glue representing a puddle of glue When a character is on a puddle of glue, it waits 2 turns before moving
    class 
    Ladder
    Ladder is a tool that can be used by Hunter to climb up walls It can be used only once and by only one Hunter.
    class 
    Pickaxe
    Pickaxe is a tool that can be used by the hunter to break a Stone of a Wall.
    class 
    RoadMap
    RoadMap is a class that represents the road map to the treasure it guides the hunter to the treasure by giving him the best direction to the treasure
    class 
    Stone
    Stone class that makes up the walls
    class 
    Tool
    Class that represents a tool
    class 
    Treasure
    Treasure is a class that represents the treasure in the game and the goal of the game is to find that treasure.
